turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order a coffee drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, give me a second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How may I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a large Iced Vanilla Latte off the shop of 4th Ave. in Dallas, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what else do you want to put in there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have some milk foam.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check. Sorry, they ran out of milk foam.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine. How about steamed milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is available. What else do you want to add into the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I will make the order right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they offer any honey?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I think they do. Would you like some?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to have some.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will add that into as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order at the store and will be ready for pickup shortly. And your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
